articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: France to deploy more troops to troubled Pacific territory of New Caledonia - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Noumea’s international airport remains closed; Australia and New Zealand to use military planes to evacuate tourists.
articles.content: French President Emmanuel Macron is heading to New Caledonia, the government has announced, as hundreds more security personnel will join the 1,500 reinforcements already on the ground after the wors… [+3686 chars]
